title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Military Base in Southern Lebanon: Latest Updates”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a military structure of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in southern Lebanon.

Fighter jets attacked a military structure of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the Al-Jarmal area in southern Lebanon a short while ago.

Following alerts activated in the north of the country at 20:01 due to concerns about the infiltration of hostile aircraft, this was a false alarm.

Following alerts activated at 20:14 in the Upper Galilee, two launches were identified crossing from Lebanese territory and falling in open areas; there are no casualties.

Attached is documentation of the attack on the military structure: https://bit.ly/3z2cJMZ
